viewData.name: Sony XBR-X800E 43" Class HDR UHD Smart LED TV
viewData.short_description: Buy Sony XBR-X800E 43" Class HDR UHD Smart LED TV featuring UHD 3840 x 2160 LED Panel, HDR10-Compatible 60 Hz Refresh Rate / Motionflow XR 240. Review Sony X800E
viewData.long_description: View content at four times the resolution of 1080p with the Sony XBR-X800E 43" Class HDR UHD Smart LED TV. It has a 42.5" LED edge-lit LCD display, and incorporates Sony's Motionflow XR 240 technology to digitally enhance fast-moving images to reduce blur. The XBR-X800E has built-in Wi-Fi and Ethernet connectivity to allow access to your favorite apps and Internet-based content via its Android TV operating system, plus content sharing and screen mirroring with your other compatible smart devices such as your smartphone or tablet. With one component video and four HDMI inputs, there are multiple options for connecting high-definition video sources. The component input also acts as a hybrid port, which allows you to connect a composite video source instead. Three USB ports are also onboard for connecting compatible multimedia peripherals like flash drives.
